document.full_text: the serbian government may ask the international monetary fund for about 1 billion euros ($1.42 billion) as part of its future precautionary deal with the lender, an imf official said on friday.
document.title: serbia may ask imf for 1 bln euros: imf official
lines_and_colors: the serbian government may ask the international monetary fund for about 1 billion euros ($1.42 billion) as part of its future precautionary deal with the lender, an imf official said on friday.
